2010.context: Freshworks Inc. is a SaaS customer and employee engagement software focused on CRM, IT service management, and customer support software. Founded in India as Freshdesk. SMB help desk software.

competitors.name: Zendesk
competitors.notes: Established customer service platform, founded 2007, market leader by 2010

competitors.name: Salesforce Service Cloud
competitors.notes: Enterprise-grade customer service software

competitors.name: Zoho Desk
competitors.notes: Part of Zoho's suite, early cloud-based helpdesk competitor

2015.query: Freshworks Freshdesk competitors 2015 customer service helpdesk
2015.context: Freshworks Inc. is a SaaS customer and employee engagement software focused on CRM, IT service management, and customer support software. Expanded to CRM and IT management. Freshsales, Freshservice.

competitors.name: Zendesk
competitors.notes: Market leader in cloud-based customer service software, founded in 2007. Zendesk was the primary competitor with strong enterprise presence, extensive features, and higher pricing that Freshworks positioned against.

competitors.name: Salesforce Service Cloud
competitors.notes: Enterprise customer service platform integrated with Salesforce's CRM ecosystem, targeting larger organizations with complex service requirements.

competitors.name: Zoho Desk (Zoho Support)
competitors.notes: Part of Zoho's suite of business applications, offering helpdesk and customer support functionality with strong integration across Zoho products, competing in the SMB space.

competitors.name: Desk.com
competitors.notes: Small business-focused helpdesk solution (acquired by Salesforce in 2011) that competed in the SMB market segment before being merged into Service Cloud.

competitors.name: UserVoice
competitors.notes: Customer feedback and helpdesk platform popular with SaaS companies, offering ticketing, feedback forums, and knowledge base features.

competitors.name: Help Scout
competitors.notes: Simple, email-based customer support platform targeting small businesses looking for an alternative to complex helpdesk systems.

competitors.name: TeamSupport
competitors.notes: B2B-focused customer support software offering ticket management and collaboration features for support teams.

2020.context: Freshworks Inc. is a SaaS customer and employee engagement software focused on CRM, IT service management, and customer support software. IPO preparation. Unified platform strategy.

competitors.name: Zendesk
competitors.notes: Major competitor with multi-channel support and workforce management

competitors.name: Salesforce
competitors.notes: Cloud-based CRM with Service Cloud offering

competitors.name: ServiceNow
competitors.notes: Primary competitor in enterprise ITSM and customer service

competitors.name: Zoho
competitors.notes: Comprehensive suite including CRM, helpdesk support tools

competitors.name: HubSpot Service Hub
competitors.notes: Customer service integrated with HubSpot CRM ecosystem

competitors.name: Intercom
competitors.notes: Conversational relationship platform with messaging

competitors.name: Jira Service Management
competitors.notes: IT service management from Atlassian

competitors.name: Gorgias
competitors.notes: Specialized for ecommerce (Shopify, BigCommerce)

competitors.name: Help Scout
competitors.notes: User-friendly for SaaS and ecommerce businesses

2024.context: Freshworks Inc. is a SaaS customer and employee engagement software focused on CRM, IT service management, and customer support software. Freddy AI across products. SMB and mid-market focus.

competitors.name: HubSpot
competitors.notes: AI-based CRM with comprehensive marketing and service solutions

competitors.name: Zendesk
competitors.notes: Multi-channel support for retail, financial services, education, healthcare

competitors.name: Zoho
competitors.notes: 60,000+ clients, cloud-based tools with AI assistant Zia

competitors.name: Salesforce
competitors.notes: Leading CRM platform with Service Cloud

competitors.name: Dialpad
competitors.notes: AI-powered communications platform

competitors.name: Uniphore
competitors.notes: Top competitor in conversational AI and automation

competitors.name: Forethought
competitors.notes: Customer support automation with generative AI

competitors.name: Intercom
competitors.notes: AI customer service company

competitors.name: Pipedrive
competitors.notes: CRM focused on activity-based selling and pipeline management

2025.context: Freshworks Inc. is a SaaS customer and employee engagement software focused on CRM, IT service management, and customer support software. AI-powered business software. Competing with Zendesk, ServiceNow.

competitors.name: Zendesk
competitors.notes: Primary competitor in customer support and service desk software

competitors.name: Salesforce Service Cloud
competitors.notes: Enterprise customer service platform with broader CRM ecosystem

competitors.name: ServiceNow
competitors.notes: Enterprise IT service management competing with Freshservice

competitors.name: HubSpot
competitors.notes: CRM and marketing platform competing across multiple product lines

competitors.name: Zoho
competitors.notes: Business software suite with similar SMB focus and pricing

competitors.name: Intercom
competitors.notes: Customer messaging platform competing in support and engagement

competitors.name: Jira Service Management
competitors.notes: Atlassian's ITSM solution competing with Freshservice

competitors.name: Monday.com
competitors.notes: Work management platform with CRM and service capabilities

mentionedBy.name: Salesforce
mentionedBy.notes: Targeting SMB and mid-market with AI-powered features and affordable pricing

mentionedBy.name: ServiceNow Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Founded in 2010, emerging cloud-based ITSM solution targeting SMBs
